from django.http import HttpResponseRedirect
from django.shortcuts import render, redirect
from django.urls import reverse
from django.contrib import messages
from django.contrib.auth import authenticate, login, logout
from .forms import NewUserForm

# Create your views here.

[docs]def login_user(request):
    """
    Calls the html page to allow the user to log in.
    """
    return render(request, 'authorize/login.html')



[docs]def logout_user(request):
    """
    Calls the function to log the user out and redirect them to the home page (index.html).
    """
    logout(request)
    messages.info(request, "You have successfully logged out.") 
    return redirect("personal:home")



[docs]def register_user(request):
    """
    Allows the user to register if they have not registered before.

    If the credentials are valid, a Registration successful message will be logged and the user will be redirected
    to the home page.

    If the credentials are not valid, an Unsuccessful message will be displayed at the bottom of the screen and the 
    user will be allowed to re-enter their credentials.
    """
    if request.method == "POST":
        form = NewUserForm(request.POST)
        if form.is_valid():
            user = form.save()
            login(request, user)
            messages.success(request, "Registration successful." )
            return redirect("personal:home")
        messages.error(request, "Unsuccessful registration. Invalid information.")
    form = NewUserForm()
    return render (request=request, template_name="register/register.html", context={"register_form":form})



[docs]def authorize_user(request):
    """
    Confirms that the user has been registered before and is authorized to log in.
    """
    username = request.POST['username']
    password = request.POST['password']
    user = authenticate(username=username, password=password)
    if user is None:
        messages.error(request, "Invalid username or password.")
        return HttpResponseRedirect(reverse('user_auth:login'))
    else:
        login(request, user)
        return HttpResponseRedirect(reverse('personal:home'))
